sentence.Network_en: Luke's mother stopped smiling and looked reproachfully at him.
sentence.Network_cn: 卢克的妈妈收起了笑容，用责备的眼光看着他。

sentence.Network_en: I took him into the pantry, where he looked a little reproachfully at the Finn.
sentence.Network_cn: 我把他带到食品间里去, 他有点看不顺眼似地向那芬兰女人望望.
她含着嗔怨的样子看着他.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语精读单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... complaint n. 抱怨 reproachfully ad. 责备地 presumably ad. 推测起来， 大概.

list.abs: say positively 明确地说say reproachfully 责备地说say safely 有把握地说

entry.tran: （表情或话语）责备的，责怪的，谴责的
entry.def: Reproachful expressions or remarks show that you are disappointed, upset, or angry because someone has done something wrong.

example.ex: She gave Isabelle a reproachful look...
example.tran: 她责备地看了伊莎贝尔一眼。

example.ex: He turned to Alex and his tone was reproachful.
example.tran: 他转向亚历克斯，语气里充满了责备。

means.word_mean: 1. in a reproving or reproachful manner;

auth_sentence.content: Keeping quiet, as usual, Pereda thought reproachfully.
auth_sentence.res_content: Keeping quiet, as usual, Pereda thought reproachfully.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Keeping quiet, as usual, Pereda thought reproachfully.

auth_sentence.content: Undone work still sitting reproachfully in heaps.

auth_sentence.content: "Shapewear" underclothing for chaps will appear, reproachfully, on the shelves we visit.
